name: Dev Container
onCreateCommand: npx -y @cpdevtools/dcman-cli@latest dc-event onCreate ${devcontainerId} && cd .devcontainer && pnpm run --silent dc-onCreateCommand
updateContentCommand: npx -y @cpdevtools/dcman-cli@latest dc-event updateContent ${devcontainerId} && cd .devcontainer && pnpm run --silent dc-updateContentCommand
postCreateCommand: npx -y @cpdevtools/dcman-cli@latest dc-event postCreate ${devcontainerId} && cd .devcontainer && pnpm run --silent dc-postCreateCommand
postAttachCommand: echo $GITHUB_TOKEN && npx -y @cpdevtools/dcman-cli@latest dc-event postAttach ${devcontainerId}  && cd .devcontainer && pnpm run --silent dc-postAttachCommand
postStartCommand: npx -y @cpdevtools/dcman-cli@latest dc-event postStart ${devcontainerId} && cd .devcontainer && pnpm run --silent dc-postStartCommand
